name: La Perla Habana - Wide - Torpedo
additionalNotes:
The La Perla Habana Classic is the cigar that started it all, over 10 years ago, for the brand that also boasts the Morado, the Rojo, and the Cobre. This cigar produces a rich volume of smoke and features an excellent construction with smooth notes that are perfect for the novice as well as the seasoned
